code: import{BehaviorSubject}from'rxjs';var tickerSubject=new BehaviorSubject('');var errorMessageSubject=new BehaviorSubject('');var mostActiveDaysRangeSubject=new BehaviorSubject(7);var candlestickDaysRangeSubject=new BehaviorSubject(30);export var tickerService={changeTicker:function changeTicker(ticker){return tickerSubject.next(ticker);},clearTicker:function clearTicker(){return tickerSubject.next();},getTicker:function getTicker(){return tickerSubject.asObservable();}};export var errorMessageService={changeErrorMessage:function changeErrorMessage(message){return errorMessageSubject.next(message);},clearErrorMessage:function clearErrorMessage(){return errorMessageSubject.next();},getErrorMessage:function getErrorMessage(){return errorMessageSubject.asObservable();}};export var daysRangeService={changeMostActiveDaysRange:function changeMostActiveDaysRange(daysRange){return mostActiveDaysRangeSubject.next(daysRange);},clearMostActiveDaysRange:function clearMostActiveDaysRange(){return mostActiveDaysRangeSubject.next();},getMostActiveDaysRange:function getMostActiveDaysRange(){return mostActiveDaysRangeSubject.asObservable();},changeCandlestickDaysRange:function changeCandlestickDaysRange(daysRange){return candlestickDaysRangeSubject.next(daysRange);},clearCandlestickDaysRange:function clearCandlestickDaysRange(){return candlestickDaysRangeSubject.next();},getCandlestickDaysRange:function getCandlestickDaysRange(){return candlestickDaysRangeSubject.asObservable();}};
